Package com.BrickBreaker.gui

Class HomeMenuModel

java.lang.Object
com.BrickBreaker.gui.HomeMenuModel
public class HomeMenuModel
extends java.lang.Object
This is the HomeMenuModel class to store the data for creating HomeMenu pages on window. This is a Model class created to adhere MVC pattern
Since:
3/11/2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Alden Sia Zheng Heng
